PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body: :v: mcdoll can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7815353651/job/21318478493)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7815353651/job/21318477556)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7815353651/job/21318478189)

```suggestion
variable [MeasurableSpace F] [BorelSpace F] [SecondCountableTopology E]

theorem Basis.prod_addHaar (v : Basis ι ℝ E) (w : Basis ι' ℝ F) :
    (v.prod w).addHaar = v.addHaar.prod w.addHaar := by
  have : FiniteDimensional ℝ F := FiniteDimensional.of_fintype_basis w
  simp [(v.prod w).addHaar_eq_iff, Basis.prod_parallelepiped, Basis.addHaar_self]
```
Could you also use the same trick in the instance `SigmaFinite b.addHaar` a few lines above?

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(MeasureTheory): product of bases and Basis.addHaar commute

source.title: feat: Integration by parts for higher dimensional spaces
